#summary How to build evcpe

= Prerequisites =

evcpe depends on [libevent|http://www.monkey.org/~provos/libevent/]. Please *make install* it before compiling evcpe.

= Build Steps =

 # Download or check out evcpe from source repository.
 # Change into unpacked or checked out directory.
 # {{{make all}}}
 # That's all.
